hotels.title: Sophisticated Five-Star Angola City Break with Rooftop Pool
hotels.description: Explore rich colonial heritage, vast wilderness and massive waterfalls with a five-star stay at InterContinental Luanda Miramar, an IHG Hotel, located perfectly in Angola’s beach-blessed capital. A dazzling, diamond-inspired vision overlooking the South Atlantic Sea, the hotel has everything you need for the ultimate West African escape - savour French patisserie at Le Petit Choux, jog through Luanda’s most exclusive garden or sip cocktails by the hotel’s dazzling rooftop pool.
